title: Hitman 2 Brazilian Portuguese PT-BR NTSC PS2DVD
description:
* About this game

Hitman 2: Silent Assassin
* Eidos Interactive
* Io Interactive
* Modern Action Adventure
* Release: Oct 1, 2002
* ESRB: Mature

Hitman 2 fixes virtually all of the problems of its predecessor and stands tall on its own merits as an outstanding action game.

* About this release

Audio: English
